channel.title: üè¢ Renmin University of China on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Renmin University of China on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: ETVA: Evaluation of Text-to-Video Alignment via Fine-grained Question Generation and Answering
item.description: ETVA evaluates text-to-video alignment via fine-grained question generation and answering.

item.title: MathFusion: Enhancing Mathematic Problem-solving of LLM through Instruction Fusion
item.description: MathFusion: Instruction Fusion enhances LLM’s math problem-solving!

item.title: Perplexity Trap: PLM-Based Retrievers Overrate Low Perplexity Documents
item.description: PLM retrievers overrate low-perplexity docs, causing source bias. This paper reveals the causal effect & offers a fix!

item.title: Effective and Efficient Masked Image Generation Models
item.description: eMIGM: A unified, efficient masked image generation model achieving state-of-the-art performance with fewer resources.

item.title: SEAP: Training-free Sparse Expert Activation Pruning Unlock the Brainpower of Large Language Models
item.description: SEAP: Unlock LLM brainpower w/ training-free sparse expert activation pruning! Boost efficiency, keep accuracy. Optimize LLMs now!

item.title: R1-Searcher: Incentivizing the Search Capability in LLMs via Reinforcement Learning
item.description: R1-Searcher: RL enhances LLMs by incentivizing autonomous search, outperforming RAG methods, even GPT-4o-mini!

item.title: An Empirical Study on Eliciting and Improving R1-like Reasoning Models
item.description: This paper explores and improves R1-like reasoning models through RL and tool manipulation, achieving significant accuracy gains.

item.title: SurveyX: Academic Survey Automation via Large Language Models
item.description: SURVEYX automates academic survey generation, enhancing content and citation quality.

item.title: YuLan-Mini: An Open Data-efficient Language Model
item.description: YuLan-Mini: An open, data-efficient 2.42B parameter LLM achieving top-tier performance with innovative training techniques.

item.title: RetroLLM: Empowering Large Language Models to Retrieve Fine-grained Evidence within Generation
item.description: RetroLLM unifies retrieval & generation in LLMs, boosting accuracy and cutting costs.

item.title: HtmlRAG: HTML is Better Than Plain Text for Modeling Retrieved Knowledge in RAG Systems
item.description: HtmlRAG boosts RAG system accuracy by using HTML, not plain text, to model retrieved knowledge, improving knowledge representation and mitigating LLM hallucination.
